name: Westlouia Pilot: Through The Timber
description:
Westlouia Pilot: Through The Timber

UPDATE: Comments are now enabled! Sorry they weren't before, I didn't realize they were something you had to do manually, haha. I haven't used Itch in too long.

(Formerly Westlouia PILOT: The Otter, the Forest, and the Pearl)

Welcome to the world of Westlouia! This game is a pilot episode intended to test the waters for what will hopefully be a new episodic series. This particular episode revolves around the adventures of a boy named Sparky and an anteater named Teak as they set off to find their best friend, who has ran off after the town was rattled by a strange and mysterious earthquake.

At its heart this game is a platformer. Run, jump, and eventually shoot your way through the fields and over the hills!

Controls:

Configurable:

  • Move/Navigate Menus - Arrow Keys
  • Enter/Speak - Up Arrow
  • Jump/Advance Text - Z
  • Attack/Reverse Text - X

Non-Configurable:

  • Quit Game - Escape (Hold for 1 second)
  • Change screen size - F1/F2/F3
  • Toggle Fullscreen - F4
  • Configure Controls - F5 (On title screen)
  • Load from last checkpoint - F6

Special Thanks To:

  • Melperry - Character Design
  • IndieAnjelo - Concept Art
  • Green Dog Studios - Music

The game is free, but support is kindly appreciated!

Much of the Music in this game is by Green Dog Studios, aka Powersupply. Check out his fantastic work on his bandcamp here:
http://powersupply1.bandcamp.com
